+++ SUMMARY 

* Based on RelationalModel which is based on FirstOrderPredicateLogic, 
  * 1970 document: 
    * [rel://files/ComputerScience/Database/Relational/codd.pdf]
  

* terminology in databases is very convoluted. This wiki will use above document:

  * Relation  =     * Table, Base Relvar, Base Table
  
  * Tuple     =     * Row (Physical/Application), Record (Logical/Theoretical)
  
  * Attribute   =   * Field (Physical Application), Column (Theoretical)
  
  * Value       =   * intersection of Tuple and Attribute
                      * Field or Field Value will NOT be used.
